name: TethysTalkEwan
_source: speak;Tethys;Ewan, you've completed the task you were given, haven't you?|This is a dangerous place.|Please, go wait at the inn.|I'll be there to collect you as soon as I'm able.
speak;Ewan;No way!|I want to fight, too.|I've become friends with Prince Ephraim, you know?|We're going to take out the big, bad evil empire.
speak;Tethys;Wait just a minute, Ewan!|Ah!|Ooh, that troublemaker.
